name: A Bullet For Gold
description:
(WASD) to move
(Shift) to roll
Press (Q) to grab
Hold (Q) for lasso
Left click to shoot right click to melee 
Hold (E) to switch weapons and put the mouse over a weapon you want to switch to
(Space) to throw Dynamite
